div.p: Is the Participant required to attend the appointment.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/participantrequired defines the following codes:

tr.td: The participant is required to attend the appointment.
The participant may optionally attend the appointment.

The participant is excluded from the appointment, and may not be informed of the appointment taking place. (Appointment is about them, not for them - such as 2 doctors discussing results about a patient's test).

description.value: Is the Participant required to attend the appointment.

definition.value: The participant is required to attend the appointment.
The participant may optionally attend the appointment.

The participant is excluded from the appointment, and may not be informed of the appointment taking place. (Appointment is about them, not for them - such as 2 doctors discussing results about a patient's test).
